awd_titl_txt: A System for Symbolic Computation in Hopf Algebras
awd_abstract_narration: Computer programs to perform symbolic calculations to solve  mathematical, scientific, and engineering problems have become  popular and highly useful in the last decade.  However, systems  for symbolic computation in noncommutative algebras have not  attained the generality of systems for commutative algebra.  This  project develops a system for symbolic computation in Hopf  algebras, and supports algebras and Hopf algebras. The project  relies on multidisciplinary interaction between algebraists and  computer scientists. The Hopf system uses the GAP system as a  foundation upon which to build more advanced functions.  GAP is  freely distributed over the Internet, as is the Hopf system.  The  Hopf system is able to support advanced research in  noncommutative algebras and their applications to science,  especially mathematics and physics.
